ygData.subject: Re: Vox Dead on Tarew Marr
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Deserving? You were there, you helped bring her down.  They were wanting bards for the group.. why wouldn t you deserve it, if you could use it?
ygData.messageBody:
>One issue that was raised on this Vox raid really popped a vein in my
>forehead.
>It was when it came around to randoming off the Runed Bolster Belt.
>This is an ac 5, +10 str, +10 dex, +10 sta belt with haste effect. The
>question was raised if bards were worthy of this item, given their melee
>abilities etc. The way I look at it is the way Verant designed us.. if I
>had my choice between that belt and any instrument in the game
>(Maestro's lute for example), I'd glady choose the belt. Surely the item
>would be best in the hands of a monk, warrior, rogue, or ranger. But is
>a bard deserving of an item like that? What do you all think?
>
>Maev Lorekeeper
>Tarew Marr

Deserving? You were there, you helped bring her down. They were wanting
bards for the group.. why wouldn't you deserve it, if you could use it?

-Treehugger and Songmaker
